name: 2-Pack Pet Hair Remover Gloves - Reusable Grooming Gloves for Dogs & Cats
product_description: Presenting the 2025 Upgraded Five-Finger Electrostatic Pet Hair Removal Glove your ultimate reusable, washable static hair remover. Designed with oversized 9.6″ × 7″ coverage and breathable mesh, this static pet hair remover glove fits securely and comfortably for efficient dog and cat hair removal on couches, carpets, car seats, furniture, and clothing. Simply glide across surfaces using electrostatic action—no sticky rollers required. Save time, money, and reduce waste with a durable, eco-friendly hair remover tool built for everyday use. Tired of Pet Hair Everywhere? Imagine effortlessly removing stubborn pet hair from your couch, car, and clothes in seconds. Our 2-pack electrostatic pet hair remover gloves make it possible! Why Choose Our Grooming Gloves? ✨ Double the Value - With two gloves in each pack, tackle shedding season with a glove in every room or share with family. ✨ Static Magic Technology - The special textured surface generates static electricity that magnetically attracts embedded fur, dander, and lint from any fabric. ✨ Bond While Grooming - Turn brushing into a pampering session! The gentle massage stimulates your cat or dog’s coat, reducing shedding and promoting healthy skin. ✨ Eco-Warrior Approved - Stop buying sticky rollers! Simply rinse or machine wash (cold) to reuse hundreds of times. Perfect For: Removing dog/cat hair from furniture, carpets, and car interiors Daily pet grooming for short/long-haired breeds Lint-free clothing before leaving home Allergy sufferers reducing dander at home

short_description: 【2-in-1 Double-Sided Pet Hair Removal Glove】 This upgraded pet hair removal glove features a silicone grooming brush on one side to gently remove loose fur while massaging your pet. 【Reusable & Washable】 Fully washable and reusable, this pet hair remover glove offers an eco-friendly alternative to disposable lint rollers. Simply shake off collected hair or rinse with water to keep it ready for the next use.

【Comfortable Fit & Easy Grip】 Made with breathable mesh and a flexible, lightweight design, this glove fits securely on your hand. The non-slip grip provides better control, keeping grooming and cleaning comfortable even during longer use without hand fatigue.
